General.Name: Seah Steel Corp
General.Description: SeAH Steel Holdings Corporation manufactures and sells steel products in South Korea, the United States, Japan, China, Vietnam, the United Arab Emirates, Italy, and Indonesia. It offers carbon steel pipes, stainless steel pipes, titanium tubes, and galvanized color steel sheets. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
